author: Derek Easler
comment: Been on here for 2 weeks now and nothing. I've sent out well over 20 messages and not a single response. I've extensively redone my profile and still nothing. I don't even get any views. I joined POF and in less than an hour I was communicating with two lovely ladies. I don't recommend match for anyone. I don't care what the commercials say, this site doesn't work.

author: Andrew Michael
comment: Pretty junk. I remember when this was a big deal so I tried it for fun. Super money hungry.. More than is acceptable. I get they need to make some cash and that's fine.. But the lengths they go to is nothing short of impressive. For $40 you can have someone write up your profile for you to make you seem more appealing. So basically lie to try to get you a partner.

author: Tony Perkins
comment: Even if you pay their outrageous monthly fees...the other members of the site can't message you back...unless you pay an ADDITIONAL 9.99, on top of the monthly fee....absolutely nuts. On top of that the app is cheap and glitchy, notifications pop up and won't clear for 6 months after you acknowledge them repeatedly...garbage.

author: Kevin Nugent
comment: Waaaaay over priced then if you want someone to respond back if they didnt pay the outrageous price you need to pay an extra 10 a month. Just for them to respond. Wouldnt reccommed this site to anyone hope they wake up and cut their prices in half

author: Evens Jean-Paul
comment: One of the worst online dating apps, full of ads, and etc. You pay for the services but you don't have full control to navigate around the app. Everything is an extra charge, when I complained and request a refund. I pretty much got the: "Oh well, we don't do refunds and nothing we can do for you." You'll have a better chance at other apps than this one. 1/10 for misleading

author: Juan Castineiras
comment: It does the bare minimum. It lets you know when someone messaged or liked you.   Aside from that, everything else is annoying. Even after you sign up, you still get constantly bombarded by advertisements to spend more money. And throws things up on the screen you cannot swipe away.

author: Jon Cole
comment: App takes some getting used to. The navigation and layout needs revamped in my opinion. Some in-app notifications won't clear until you visit the website.  It's also astounding to me how many inactive profiles they match you with and exist in the service.

This app is horrible. Clearly it's designed to just take your money and not actually help you in anyway at all. This app too heavily relies on paying money just to use such basic functions. Other apps let you do way more without charging a single penny.

author: hordehunter x
comment: I hate it, you have to pay for everything and if you want to make you profile better you have to $40 as well. I had better luck on tender and meeting people then this app. They make them out to be so great and finding your "soulmate" but that's not the case. I paid for 6 months. Didn't meet one person and I will not be using them again. I'm super unhappy and won't reference anyone to match

author: Wayne Swanson
comment: Endless offers to "upgrade even after you pay you only get a few matches per day, many of which don't have pictures. Response rate from "Matches" very low. Can't message without upgrading. NOT worth the money

author: Sandra Schumann
comment: It's a waste of time and money. They will give you three months free because they really cannot guarantee to find someone compatible or anyone to match your interests. Customer service is the worst .....tried reaching out to them couple of times to fix my dob and no one ever bothered to get back to me. App is not even friendly user. If you're looking for a serious relationship, don't use this app... You'll regret it.

author: Tina otwell
comment: Please take out the "new ways to interact" when I open a profile. I can't read any of the profile without pressing the button, and then it likes the picture if I click it. Then, it appears that I like the guy before I've even looked at his profile!

author: Brad Hall
comment: There are very few users that have the paid subscription and are not able to communicate. The response rate is shockingly low, especially for a paid subscription. Don't waste your time or money with this worthless app!

author: ANGELIK * BS
comment: I defitnetly want my money back this is the worse date app ever. At least the other apps does not charge you for dating losers. Omg! I lost my money and time with this app. Chating by this app is horrible and those profiles aren't truly this app suck!.

author: Kanaya Marayam
comment: The app itself is fine and works well. The service however is just terrible. They nickle and dime you all the way. If you paid the $60 for 6 months, you also gotta pay the $10 to make sure when you message someone without the subscription that they can reply to you at all. It's totally absurd. I'm not re-upping after my subscription ends.

author: Justin Heinold
comment: When viewing a profile, an overlay comes up informing you of new features with regards to the like function.  You are then forced to like a photo to clear the overlay.  This is unacceptable as far as I'm concerned and I would give a more negative rating if I could.

author: Katie Lackey
comment: This is the worst dating app dont waste your time or money with it. Other apps has what this site offers at 30 a month for free and any paid extras on those sites you have to pay for on top of what you're already paying for match, on free sites i would get 3 messages a day i barely get that a week with match, I get matched with people who are completely incompatible with me. And forget their "profile makeover" all you'll get is a one line discretion that i have seen 20 times. I cant change my age range. I dont have some of the fields that others have. Not worth the money not worth the time.

author: Kathy Hatty
comment: HATE it.  They want you to spend $ to be able to let OTHERS email/msg you back!  Really?!? (So now you don't know if they didn't msg you back because their not interested or if they just didn't pay the extra $). And to get your picture viewed at the "top" of the list.  AND it doesn't listen to the parameters you set - you get everyone even if you specified that you didn't want it (For example if you're a tall girl & you'd rather not see guys who are shorter than you are, you'll get them anyway).  It's horrible and useless unless you're willing to spend ALL your money for each of the million stupid little "benefits."  NOT free.  And HORRIBLE.  (And to take yourself off the auto pay is hard and not easy to find out how to do.  Nicely done...😝)

author: Benjamin Fillipucci
comment: Don't waste your time. It would be half bad. If every thing was not so expensive. Like any thing you'd want todo is a different in app purchase. And every time you open it tries to up sale you.

author: Frank Pampena
comment: A total waste. Paid for three months and didn't have a single meaningful conversation with anyone of interest. Almost every person I messaged did not reply back and wayyy too many fake accounts for a paid dating app. Ridiculous

author: David Howard
comment: Everything is pay to play, and then they nickel & dime you. Some notifications can't be cleared, unnecessarily difficult to flag false accounts, and they catfish you with said accounts until you pay them. Not looking forward to the nightmare of trying to cancel all the automatic service renewals...

author: runningquestbr
comment: They find find matches but you'll have to pay to communicate with them. (I felt like it was a hostage situation)<- JOKE. I'm just say It's an unfair process.

author: Soviet Slav
comment: Horrible! You can't even see who likes you without paying 30$!!! A month?!?!? Ridiuclous! They try and nickle and dime everything they can out of you, even some weird stuff like the "seen" messaging feature your probably common with on FB messanger... Don't download, dont waste your money. Better free apps available

author: Marino Anderson
comment: Great features. INCOMPETENT security team. Tech team has built a superior platform but the security team allows absolutely too many  spammers through... you will waste most of your time blocking rather than looking.
Seriously why would I pay you to talk to a bunch of man that are 10 to 12 years older than me. After I specifically chose the age group that I wanted to get message from. SCAMMERRRRRRSSSSSS

author: Stacey W
comment: Guys rarely respond even if they reached out first. This was my 4th time paying and I'm done. Too much money wasted with no results. I'd rather take my chances on the free sites. These dating sites are not like they used to be. I thought by paying, I'd meet a quality, respectful man...not so much.
Not a bad app.  Super annoyed that you can't go that far back to look at messages you received.  I have to go the actual website if I want to view or reply to older messages.

author: Shawn Beach
comment: I met my previous relationship on this site more than 15 years ago.  I had always praised the site before.  Now however it is just filled with fake messages saying to email me on my yahoo email, and other messages that say someone is interested in you, however when you click on the link you just get a message saying the profile is no longer available.  This happens many times a day.   Not worth the money and they have a no refund policy, so save your money.

author: Ann Coleman
comment: Most unuseful app I've ever tried to use. They junked it up with full page ads on top of the page you try to bring up. I can't even figure out how to get them to go away. It's organized differently than the website so it's completely unfamiliar. And it's obviously totally designed to sell not help. And yes I'm a paid, signed in subscriber.

This is the worst dating site ever. I cancelled my subscription months ago but today I was charged for another subscription. I called and they stated that I never cancelled and will not give me a refund. I know I cancelled! Very angry user 😠

author: Robert Ford
comment: Paid for the app a couple months ago, since then have talked to 1 real person that isn't fake or not paid for not worth the money at all. Personally think it should be called divorced almost everyone on here is divorced with kids

author: Monica Chaumont
comment: This app does not at all do what I expected. If you want to manually filter through a ton of incompatible matches, then this might work for you. The service simply does not filter matches based on your preferences, age range, distance, etc. It is so misleading to be able to enter preferences and to discover that they are completely ignored not only in terms of who will send you messages but in the actual matches as well.

author: anthony h
comment: Not even remotely worth the asking price, not really sure what you guys are thinking with these price points. At 5 dollars you might have had me but 35 a month?! Or I can pay for six months that I likely won't use most of if I find someone right away? I get the want to make money but this is borderline scam and if you want to compete with the other apps I would suggest fixing your pricing.

author: Lizayda Hernandez
comment: This app sucks. This is simular to tinder everyone trying to get laid on the first night why pay for a membership if u could just go on tinder and get the same results for free. They need to do better than this on choosing clients not happy al all.

author: Travis Bell
comment: SCAM. They don't issue refunds even just hours after payment and will ignore your customer service messages. And even with a paid app you will be constantly bombarded with requests for add-ons. Who ever is at the top of this company is greedy. Use tinder or plenty of fish. Not worth paying for. There are very few things I regret and this one of them.

author: Shannon Cleveland
comment: If you don't  pay for a subscription the only thing you can do is look at profiles. If someone  likes you,  you can't  see who it is without  paying for it!  Should at least be able to see who likes you!  Let members share a private email for free!
I want to go pay, saying I'm paying $9 for a bundle for the next six months and that $9 turned into $59 in total. Give me my money back. I am not happy.

author: Reaper Rogue
comment: It's bs they said I would be paying 9.99$ another for 6 month but it changed me all at once for it so now I'm screwed and gonna starve for these next 2 weeks and they don't allow refunds

author: Greg G
comment: The phone/tablet app is horrible. It doesn't update correctly. As an example a notification that had registered on my laptop shows up hours later on my phone. Deleting old likes is impossible, it goes on and on. In a world where people use their smartphones more often than a computer this app sucks. I'm actually cancelling my subscription and this is part of the reason.

Cancellation request links are broken, and an announcement to try again later will appear. Not cool, especially when you have entered your payment info to try the site. Girls are usually free I think. It's worse than pimping, you will be charged for just looking!
